fields_of_interest: Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety
industry_forums: Health Workforce Planning and Forecasting Expert (SEPEN) Network
eu_initiatives: Partecipazione in qualità di esperti a Health Workforce Planning and Forecasting Expert (SEPEN) Network
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
ITALIAN MEDICAL ASSOCIATION (AIM) is a professional association between Italian physicians, founded with the aims 
1) to promote the alliance between medicine and science 
2) to represent Italian doctors on the basis of scientific and epidemiological evidence, of performances' measurement and assessment, of appropriateness and of a decision-making approach oriented to planning and programming
